sentences.english: Actually, we were hoping to retain your services.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望能借重閣下長才。

sentences.english: We drew on her experience throughout the project .
sentences.chinese: 我們這一項目自始至終都借重她的經驗。

sentences.english: The resuming of Han Dynasty by LiuXiu rely on the Confucianism.
sentences.chinese: 劉秀復漢的成功，與對儒家思想的借重是分不開的。
